chapters.title: Chapter 19: The Law
chapters.info: Tamra Ospenya, p. 379 (427)—Amyrlin Seat before Sierin Vayu, raised from the Blue Ajah. She was interrogated by Jarna Malari, then the head of the Black Ajah, and made to appear to have died in her sleep. Her Keeper of the Chronicles was Gitara Moroso; she was one of only three people present at Gitara's Foretelling of the Rebirth of the Dragon. This may be the information that Jarna was trying to extract from her; it may also be the reason Ishamael killed Jarna for killing Tamra. See also Amyrlin Seat.
